long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily search for cloudpages within Salesforce Marketing Cloud.

cloudpage-Search is a free chrome extension that allows you to easily search for a landing page, resource, or site within SFMC by name.
